user.title: Setup Method
user.description: Choose how to configure your water heater

data_description.setup_method: Load from a pre-configured profile or configure manually

load_profile.title: Select Profile
load_profile.description: Choose a device profile and enter your connection details

data_description.profile: Pre-configured settings for your water heater model
data_description.host: IP address of your RS485-WiFi adapter
data_description.name: Friendly name for your water heater

connection.title: Modbus Connection
connection.description: Configure the connection to your RS485-WiFi adapter

data_description.host: IP address of your RS485-WiFi adapter
data_description.modbus_unit: Device ID on the Modbus network (usually 1)
data_description.scan_interval: How often to poll for updates (60-300 recommended)

registers.title: Control Registers
registers.description: Configure power and mode register addresses

data_description.sterilize_register: Register address for sanitize mode (default: 3, leave blank to disable)
data_description.eco_mode_value: Value to write for eco mode (default: 1)
data_description.performance_mode_value: Value to write for performance mode (default: 2)
data_description.electric_mode_value: Value to write for electric mode (default: 4)

temp_registers.title: Temperature Registers
temp_registers.description: Configure temperature register addresses with scaling

data_description.temp_offset: Offset to add to current temp (default: -15.0)
data_description.target_temp_offset: Offset to add to target temp (default: 0.0)

temp_limits.title: Temperature Limits
temp_limits.description: Set min/max temperatures for each operation mode

data_description.tank_top_temp_register: Register for top tank sensor T5U (default: 101)
data_description.tank_bottom_temp_register: Register for bottom tank sensor T5L (default: 102)

data_description.name: Friendly name for your water heater

save_profile.title: Save as Profile?
save_profile.description: Optionally save this configuration as a reusable profile for easy setup or sharing

data_description.save_profile: Enable to save your settings as a profile

control_registers.title: Update Control Registers
control_registers.description: Modify power and mode register addresses (no scaling needed)

temp_registers.title: Update Temperature Registers
temp_registers.description: Configure temperature registers with individual offset and scale values

temp_limits.title: Update Temperature Limits
temp_limits.description: Configure min/max temperatures for each operation mode

sensors.title: Update Additional Sensors
sensors.description: Configure optional temperature sensors with shared offset and scale values

settings.title: Update Entity Settings
settings.description: Modify entity name and default temperature

save_as_profile.title: Save Configuration as Profile
save_as_profile.description: Save your current settings as a reusable profile that can be used for quick setup or shared with others

data_description.model_number: Water heater model this profile is for
